features.name: Application shell and view state routing
features.description: Single-page app with manual view state navigation (home, section, course, semester, admin, exam materials) managed in App component.

features.name: Supabase integration
features.description: CRUD for courses, materials, and notices using Supabase tables and storage.

features.name: Notices system (Welcome + Exam Routine)
features.description: Global two-notice system with localStorage fallback and Supabase persistence, including image embedding for exam routine.

features.name: Semester tracker
features.description: Live semester progress, phases, and next milestone display; dedicated full-screen view.

features.name: Exam materials dashboard
features.description: Full-screen smart materials dashboard for study resources.

features.name: PDF viewer modal
features.description: Reusable modal to preview PDFs and Google Drive files via embeddable links.

features.name: Google Drive configuration
features.description: Category metadata, folder links, and file listing per course category.

features.name: Course and materials management (Admin)
features.description: Admin modal workflows for adding courses, uploading materials, and managing notices.
